headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  GINIGER, BERNARD B

snippet: GINIGER--Bernard B. October 1922 - May 2015 In loving memory of Gig- raconteur par excellence. You are always in our thoughts and our hearts. Your Loving Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: GINIGER--Bernard B. October 1922 - May 2015 In loving memory of Gig- raconteur par excellence. You are always in our thoughts and our hearts. Your Loving Family 1/3
